record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that there now be a period of morning business, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 15 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
record.narrative: (The remarks of Mr. Whitehouse pertaining to the introduction of S. 2305 are printed in today's Record under "Statements on Introduced Bills and Joint Resolutions.")
